link.title: Abram P. Morris Early Childhood Center - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: This message is being sent on behalf of Acting Superintendent Robert Gregory for families in need of a device to access virtual learning. Due to the severe shortage of devices caused by chromebooks being distributed in the past and not returned, we can not provide each child a device. We will be able to distribute one device to each household in need. If you are family in need of a device, please contact your youngest child’s school on Tuesday April 21st between the hours of 9 am to 12 pm. or 1 pm- to 4 pm to request the device. We will make arrangements for you to pick the device up.

All families will have to sign a contract and will be contacted by their child’s school to identify the date and time, the device can be retrieved. All devices distributed must be returned in accordance with the contract your family will sign.
We hope everyone remains safe and healthy. Thank you for your continued support.

em.strong: "It is our goal to resolve concerns quickly and at the lowest possible level. However, all unresolved concerns can be addressed with the Superintendent after following the Chain of Command."
